articles.author: Mehera  Bonner
articles.title: Funniest Reactions to Emma Watson's Gravity Defying Loewe Dress - Cosmopolitan
articles.description: “That dress is the result of when you try to fold a fitted sheet.”
articles.content: Emma Watson recently followed in the illustrious footsteps of countless other celebrities and started her own liquor brand; a luxury gin made with upcycled grapes called Renais. Which...sounds fancy!… [+1460 chars]
